main event: A sighting report describes a brilliant, blinding light observed on May 31, 1960, followed by a smaller light three to four minutes later.
interesting points: The observation was classified as 'Ground-Visual',The sighting report states the initial light was small and gradually enlarged,The total duration of the event was around four minutes,There was a lack of details regarding the motion or unusual size of the lights,The report was forwarded to the USAF for further action and consideration.
sighted object: brilliant, blinding light followed by a smaller light
